_header: God of heaven that shaped earth and hell

BLCottTitAXXVI.First Lines:
God of hewine that shoope Erthe and helleȝif me grace svme
                    word to telle…
BLCottTitAXXVI.Last Lines:
…And so to ffyght and to prayeThat we be sawyd at domys
                    daye
BLCottTitAXXVI.Note:
The name ‘Henry Wardman’ is written in the scribe’s
                    hand in the margin.
BLCottTitAXXVI.Editions:
Simmons,  Thomas Frederick. 
             The Lay Folks’ Mass Book.
EETS
         o.s. 71 (1879); repr. 1968: 148-54.
